relation: Great for these types of students

Those who are interested in nursing and criminal justice, this is DEFINITELY the school for you. They cater to those majors the most, as well as a few others. Also, if you are a quiet person who is all about the academics, this is also the perfect atmosphere for you.

There are clubs available, but because this is a community college, most people who attend the school have their own lives going on. So, it's difficult getting people involved in festivities, thus, making the campus kind of boring.
Make sure you pay attention to the curriculum of your major before registering to attend. Make sure RVCC caters to your particular major so that you can excel here.
The classes are great, but the curriculum for my major is ridiculous and should be improved. Plus, the campus is boring. I don't think this is the college for me.
pageTitle: Raritan Valley Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {171580=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 433=at rvcc there is many clubs and activities that go on, on a regular basis. our college hour is on a tuesday and thursday from 1:00-2:00 and this is where most of the activities are held. we have a great gym and swimming pool and also a planetarium where many shows are held such as the light show. we also have a theatre where shows and singing competitions are usually held. at rvcc you are sure to have something to do with all the fun held things that go on throughout the week., 126661=I attended RVCC in 1978 and was not ready for the college experience. Thirty years later, I am finding the college experience to be better than anticipated. RVCC is a wonderful place for anyone who is returning to college later in life., 113799=worth every penny. $2000 for 5 classes.}

textAfterTable: the academic rigor at the school is very good. my gpa is a 3.3 and this just shows how much the professor and students want to learn. many students go on to 4 year colleges and have been on deans list which shows the school has great students with great grades. Tips for prospective students tips for prospective students would have to be: dont be afraid, there is many great students who are friendly and will help you out make sure you research about your professor and see if they are up to your standards make sure you get early to class if you have morning classes as parking is very hetic In three sentences raritan valley community college is a wonderful college where you are ensured to succeed to your highest. the professors are very helpful and will work with you in any situation. the whole campus its self is accessible, clean and have many resources on campus to help you succeed to your highest potential.
